triggers.label: Absolute date/time Trigger
triggers.description: This triggers a rule based on a fixed date/time

configDescriptions.name: date
configDescriptions.label: Date
configDescriptions.description: A date with the pattern yyyy-mm-dd

configDescriptions.name: time
configDescriptions.label: Time
configDescriptions.description: A time with the pattern hh:mm:ss

configDescriptions.name: randomizeTime
configDescriptions.label: Randomized Time bound
configDescriptions.description: An upper time bound with the pattern hh:mm:ss. If this is given, the trigger triggers on a random time between Time and Randomized Time
